version_history.changes: Added Privacy Engineer for GDPR/CCPA compliance and privacy-by-design, Git Expert for advanced Git operations and workflow management, plus Computer Vision and NLP/LLM Integration specialists

Added comprehensive automation, data engineering, AI/ML, infrastructure, and security specialists including CI/CD, QA automation, serverless architecture, SRE, observability, DevSecOps, and Pulumi TypeScript specialists
Added security, mobile development, infrastructure automation, payment integration, healthcare compliance, and code refactoring specialists
Added business strategy, infrastructure operations, and AI analysis agents with new workflows
Complete unified agent system with resilience and logging integration across all frameworks
